actr.env

Class Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • actr.env.Core

  • public class Core
extends java.lang.Object
    The core class for managing the entire application. This class keeps track of all open frames as well as application-wide preferences.
    Author:
    Dario Salvucci

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean closeAllFrames()
      Closes all frames, except when a frame is unsaved and the user cancels the save operation.
      void closeFrame(Frame frame)
      Closes the given frame, asking to save changes if necessary.
      Frame currentFrame()
      Gets the currently active frame.
      Frame getFrame(java.io.File file)
      Gets the frame associated with the given file.
      int getFrameCount()
      Gets the current number of open frames.
      Frame newFrame()
      Creates a new frame with a new (untitled) file.
      Frame newFrame(java.io.File file)
      Creates a new frame and loads the given file into the frame.
      void openFrame()
      Presents an Open File dialog box to the user and, if a file is selected, opens the file.
      void openFrame(java.io.File file)
      Opens the given file.
      boolean quit()
      Closes all frames and exits the application, except when a frame is unsaved and the user cancels the save operation.

        public int getFrameCount()
        Gets the current number of open frames.
        Returns:
        the number of open frames

      • getFrame

        public Frame getFrame(java.io.File file)
        Gets the frame associated with the given file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file
        Returns:
        the associated frame, or null if not present

      • currentFrame

        public Frame currentFrame()
        Gets the currently active frame.
        Returns:
        the current frame, or null if no frames exist

      • newFrame

        public Frame newFrame()
        Creates a new frame with a new (untitled) file.
        Returns:
        a new frame

      • newFrame

        public Frame newFrame(java.io.File file)
        Creates a new frame and loads the given file into the frame.
        Parameters:
        file - the file
        Returns:
        a new frame

      • openFrame

        public void openFrame()
        Presents an Open File dialog box to the user and, if a file is selected, opens the file.

      • openFrame

        public void openFrame(java.io.File file)
        Opens the given file. If the current frame has an unchanged blank document, the file is loaded into the current frame; otherwise, the file is loaded into a new frame.
        Parameters:
        file - the file

      • closeFrame

        public void closeFrame(Frame frame)
        Closes the given frame, asking to save changes if necessary.
        Parameters:
        frame - the frame

      • closeAllFrames

        public boolean closeAllFrames()
        Closes all frames, except when a frame is unsaved and the user cancels the save operation.
        Returns:
        true if all frames were closed, or false otherwise

      • quit

        public boolean quit()
        Closes all frames and exits the application, except when a frame is unsaved and the user cancels the save operation.
        Returns:
        true if the quit is successful, or false otherwise
